channel.title: Sitecore 9 on Blog about Sitecore development
channel.description: Recent content in Sitecore 9 on Blog about Sitecore development

item.title: Speed up Sitecore 9 start
item.description: Sitecore 9 can be slow to start, which is especially annoying during development. Below are some configuration tweaks to speed it up. Scheduling Put some agents on low rotation: <scheduling> <!-- Update this agent so it doesn't run every 10 seconds. Appears to be related to email contact management. --> <agent type="Sitecore.ListManagement.Operations.UpdateListOperationsAgent, Sitecore.ListManagement"> <patch:attribute name="interval">00:30:00</patch:attribute> </agent> <agent type="Sitecore.ContentSearch.SolrProvider.Agents.IndexingStateSwitcher, Sitecore.ContentSearch.SolrProvider"> <patch:attribute name="interval">08:00:00</patch:attribute> </agent> <!-- Never automatically build core or master index --> <agent name="Core_Database_Agent"> <patch:attribute name="interval">00:00:00</patch:attribute> </agent> <agent name="Master_Database_Agent"> <patch:attribute name="interval">00:00:00</patch:attribute> </agent> </scheduling> Processors Remove some processors that are not needed during development:
